conbody.p: executorsHDFS File MetadataHDFS File Metadata executoroverviewThe HDFS File Metadata executor changes file metadata for closed files in a local or HDFS directory each time it receives a file closure event record. Use the HDFS File Metadata executor as part of an event handling stream.

The HDFS File Metadata executor can change the following file metadata:
File name
File location
Permissions, including the owner or group associated with the file and access permissions

When you configure the HDFS File Metadata executor, you configure the expression that represents the location and name of the file to process, and the file metadata changes that you want to use. You can also configure the executor to generate events for another event handling stream.
